search.query:
|makeresults |eval usetstats="Yes" |eval notstats="No" |eval tstatstag=`tstatstag` |eval tstats_compute=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats dc(resource.data.id) as Count where","") |eval tstats_simple=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats count where","") |eval tstats_nulls=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","") |eval stats_count=if(tstatstag=="No", "|stats count ", "")
|eval tstats_gcs=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","") |eval tstats_gcs2=if(tstatstag=="Yes", "|tstats fillnull_value=\"-\" count where","search ") |eval table_gcs=if(tstatstag=="No", "|table "," by ")

$tstats_compute$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Instance $stats_count$ by _time, name, resource.data.name, resource.data.status, resource.data.id, resource.data.machineType, update_time, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ | eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") |eval zone=replace(name,"\S+zones\/(\S+)\/instances\S+","\1") | search zone IN (*) |dedup resource.data.id sortby -update_time | rename resource.data.machineType as mType resource.data.id as "Instance ID"| eval Type=replace(mType,"^\S+machineTypes\/(\S+)","\1") | eval Name=replace(name,"^\S+instances\/(\S+)","\1") |table "Instance ID" , Name, projectid, zone, resource.data.status, Type, update_time |rename projectid as ProjectID, resource.data.status as "Last Known Status" update_time as "Last Update"

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Disk" earliest=-24h@h latest=now $stats_count$ by resource.data.id ,name, resource.data.name, resource.data.sizeGb, resource.data.type, resource.data.sourceImage, resource.data.guestOsFeatures{}.type, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ |dedup resource.data.id |eval ProjectID=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") |eval Zone=replace(name,"^\S+zones\/(\S+)\/disks\/\S+","\1") |eval dName=replace(name,"^\S+projects\/(\S+)","\1") |rename resource.data.id as ID, resource.data.type as Type, resource.data.sourceImage as sourceImage, resource.data.guestOsFeatures{}.type as GuestOSFeatures, resource.data.sizeGb as Size, resource.data.name as Name |eval Type=replace(Type,"\S+diskTypes\/(\S+)","\1") |eval sourceImage=replace(sourceImage,"\S+images\/(\S+)","\1") | search Zone IN (*) |table ProjectID,Zone,ID,Name,Size, Type, sourceImage, GuestOSFeatures

| set diff [ search `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Instance" | eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") | eval Zone=replace(name,"^\S+zones\/(\S+)\/instances\/\S+","\1") | spath output=disklist path=resource.data.disks{} | rex max_match=20 field=disklist "source\":\"https:\/\/www.googleapis.com\/compute\/v1\/projects\/(?<diskName>\S*)\"," | mvexpand diskName | bin span=900s _time | stats latest(_time) AS latest_recorded_event by diskName | eventstats max(latest_recorded_event) AS latest_recording | where latest_recorded_event=latest_recording | fields diskName ] [ search `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Disk" | eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") | eval Zone=replace(name,"^\S+zones\/(\S+)\/disks\/\S+","\1") | eval diskName=replace(name,"^\S+projects\/(\S+)","\1") | bin span=900s _time | stats latest(_time) AS latest_recorded_event by diskName | eventstats max(latest_recorded_event) AS latest_recording | where latest_recorded_event=latest_recording | fields diskName ]

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Network" $stats_count$ by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode, resource.data.subnetworks{}, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(name,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |rename resource.data.subnetworks{} as subnetworks, resource.data.routingConfig.routingMode as "Routing Mode" |rex max_match=30 field=subnetworks "https:\/\/www.googleapis.com\/compute\/v1\/projects\/\S*\/regions\/(?<regionval>\S*)\/subnetworks\/(?<subnetnames>\S*)" |eval subs=regionval.":".subnetnames |stats list(subs) as "Region:Subnet Name" by projectid, vpcname, "Routing Mode" |rename projectid as "Project ID", vpcname as "VPC Name"

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Subnetwork" $stats_count$ by resource.data.network, resource.location, resource.data.name, resource.data.ipCidrRange, resource.data.gatewayAddress, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.network as network |eval projectid=replace(network,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |eval vpcname=replace(network,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |stats list(resource.location) as Location list(resource.data.name) as "SubNet Name" list(resource.data.ipCidrRange) as "IP CIDR Range", list(resource.data.gatewayAddress) as "Gateway Address", by projectid, vpcname |rename vpcname as "VPC Name"

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="compute.googleapis.com/Route" $stats_count$ by resource.data.id, name, resource.data.network , resource.data.nextHopNetwork, resource.data.priority, resource.data.destRange, resource.data.description, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ |eval ProjectID=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |rename name as Name, resource.data.network as VPC, resource.data.nextHopNetwork as "Next Hop Network", resource.data.priority as Priority, resource.data.destRange as "Dest Range", resource.data.description as Description |table ProjectID, Name, VPC, "Next Hop Network", "Dest Range", Priority, Description

`gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Firewall |spath output=data path=resource.data |eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/global\S+","\1") |search projectid=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.network as vpcname |eval vpc=replace(vpcname,"\S+\/networks\/(\S+)","\1") |rex max_match=20 field=data "\{\"IPProtocol\":\"(?<Protocol>\w+)\"(,\"ports\":\[(?<Ports>\"[^\]]*))*" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceRanges\":\[(?<sourceRanges>\"[^\]]*)" |rex max_match=20 field=data "\"sourceTags\":\[(?<sourceTags>\"[^\]]*)" |dedup resource.data.name |table projectid, vpc, resource.data.name, resource.data.priority, resource.data.direction,Protocol, sourceRanges, Ports, sourceTags, resource.data.logConfig.enable, resource.data.description |rename resource.data.name as "Firewall Name", resource.data.priority as Priority, resource.data.direction as "Direction", resource.data.logConfig.enable as "Logs Enabled", resource.data.description as Description

$tstats_gcs$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type="storage.googleapis.com/Bucket" $table_gcs$ resource.data.id, resource.data.location, resource.data.locationType, resource.data.projectNumber, resource.data.storageClass, resource.data.retentionPolicy.retentionPeriod, resource.data.retentionPolicy.effectiveTime, resource.data.retentionPolicy.isLocked, ancestors{} | rename "ancestors{}" as ancestors |search ancestors=$project_tok$ |rename resource.data.projectNumber as project_number | join project_number [ $tstats_gcs2$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Project $table_gcs$ resource.parent, resource.data.name |rename resource.parent as parent resource.data.name as ProjectID |eval project_number=replace(parent,"\S+projects\/(\d+)","\1") |fields - count, - parent] |table ProjectID, resource.data.id, resource.data.location, resource.data.locationType, resource.data.storageClass, resource.data.retentionPolicy.retentionPeriod, resource.data.retentionPolicy.effectiveTime, resource.data.retentionPolicy.isLocked |rename resource.data.id as Bucket, resource.data.location as Location, resource.data.locationType as "Location Type", resource.data.storageClass as "Storage Class", resource.data.retentionPolicy.retentionPeriod as "Retention Period", resource.data.retentionPolicy.effectiveTime as "Retention Effective Time", resource.data.retentionPolicy.isLocked as "Retention Policy Locked" |dedup ProjectID Bucket

$tstats_simple$ `gcp_assets_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:buckets:jsondata) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Project $stats_count$ by resource.parent, resource.data.name |rename resource.parent as parent resource.data.name as ProjectID |eval project_number=replace(parent,"\S+(projects\/\d+)","\1") |fields - count, - parent
